about_the_game:
Every day is an exciting day to eat, drink, and fall in love with the girl in your dreams.

Bistro Days is a comfortable, relaxing visual novel/dating sim set in the fictional city of Wisteria.

Start working at a bistro, meet three charming characters with their own hopes and dreams.

Will your choices lead to a happy romantic ending you all deserve?

Demo Features


  • 3 main romanceable characters
    [*Fully voiced CGs
  • Play as a male or female protagonist
  • Partial voice acting
  • Choice driven storyline
  • High-Resolution Backgrounds
  • Demo contains 45 minutes of gameplay

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, and may not be safe to view at work: Bosom close-ups (No nudity). revealing clothes.
